activeIngredient.title: Active Ingredient
activeIngredient.description: An active ingredient, typically chemical compounds and/or biologic substances.

background.title: Background
background.description: Descriptive information establishing a historical perspective on the supplement. May include the rationale for the name, the population where the supplement first came to prominence, etc.

dosageForm.title: Dosage Form
dosageForm.description: A dosage form in which this drug/supplement is available, e.g. 'tablet', 'suspension', 'injection'.

isProprietary.title: Is Proprietary
isProprietary.description: True if this item's name is a proprietary/brand name (vs. generic name).

mechanismOfAction.title: Mechanism of Action
mechanismOfAction.description: The specific biochemical interaction through which this drug or supplement produces its pharmacological effect.

nonProprietaryName.title: Non Proprietary Name
nonProprietaryName.description: The generic name of this drug or supplement.

safetyConsideration.title: Safety Consideration
safetyConsideration.description: Any potential safety concern associated with the supplement. May include interactions with other drugs and foods, pregnancy, breastfeeding, known adverse reactions, and documented efficacy of the supplement.

targetPopulation.title: Target Population
targetPopulation.description: Characteristics of the population for which this is intended, or which typically uses it, e.g. 'adults'.
